00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : Collision
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : David S. Whyte [david(at)ihpc.a-star.edu.sg]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00013

00029 
00030  SUBROUTINE Collision
00031 
00032 !  Common Variables
00033  USE NTypes,      ONLY : DBL
00034  USE Domain,      ONLY : inv12, inv6, ni, now, nxt, xl, xu, yl, yu, zl, zu
00035  USE FluidParams
00036  USE LBMParams,   ONLY : Eg0n, Eg1n, Eg2n, EgC0n, EgC1n, EgC2n, invCs_sq, f, g
00037  IMPLICIT NONE
00038 
00039 !  Local Variables
00040  INTEGER :: i, j, k, ie, iw, jn, js, kt, kb
00041  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: muPhin, phin, phin2
00042  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: rhon, invRhon
00043  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: sFx, sFy, sFz
00044  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: UF, ux, uy, uz, Vg, Vsq
00045  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Af0, Af1, Ag0, Ag1, Cf1
00046  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Eg1A, Eg2A, Eg1R, Eg2R
00047  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: geq1, geq2, gradPhiX, gradPhiY, gradPhiZ, lapPhi
00048  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: in01, in02, in03, in04, in05, in06, in07, in08, in09
00049  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: in10, in11, in12, in13, in14, in15, in16, in17, in18
00050 
00051 
00052 ! Order parameter update
00053  DO k = zl, zu
00054    DO j = yl, yu
00055      DO i = xl, xu
00056        phi(i,j,k) = SUM( f(i,j,k,:,now) )
00057      END DO
00058    END DO
00059  END DO
00060 
00061  DO k = zl, zu
00062    DO j = yl, yu
00063      DO i = xl, xu
00064 
00065 ! Define some local values
00066        phin    = phi(i,j,k)
00067        phin2   = phin*phin
00068        rhon    = SUM( g(i,j,k,:,now) )
00069        invRhon = 1.D0/rhon
00070 
00071 !-------- Differential terms ---------------------------------------------------
00072 ! Identify neighbours
00073        ie = ni(i,j,k,1)
00074        iw = ni(i,j,k,2)
00075        jn = ni(i,j,k,3)
00076        js = ni(i,j,k,4)
00077        kt = ni(i,j,k,5)
00078        kb = ni(i,j,k,6)
00079 
00080 ! Nodal phi values
00081        in01 = phi(ie,j ,k )
00082        in02 = phi(iw,j ,k )
00083        in03 = phi(i ,jn,k )
00084        in04 = phi(i ,js,k )
00085        in05 = phi(i ,j ,kt)
00086        in06 = phi(i ,j ,kb)
00087        in07 = phi(ie,jn,k )
00088        in08 = phi(iw,js,k )
00089        in09 = phi(ie,js,k )
00090        in10 = phi(iw,jn,k )
00091        in11 = phi(ie,j ,kt)
00092        in12 = phi(iw,j ,kb)
00093        in13 = phi(ie,j ,kb)
00094        in14 = phi(iw,j ,kt)
00095        in15 = phi(i ,jn,kt)
00096        in16 = phi(i ,js,kb)
00097        in17 = phi(i ,jn,kb)
00098        in18 = phi(i ,js,kt)
00099 
00100 ! Laplacian of the order parameter phi
00101        lapPhi = ( in07 + in08 + in09 + in10 + in11 + in12 + in13 + in14 + in15 &
00102               + in16 + in17 + in18 + 2.0D0*( in01 + in02 + in03 + in04 + in05  &
00103               + in06 - 12.D0*phin ) )*inv6
00104 
00105 ! Gradient components of the order parameter phi
00106        gradPhiX = ( 2.0D0*( in01 - in02 ) + in07 - in08 + in09 - in10 + in11 &
00107                 - in12 + in13 - in14 )*inv12
00108 
00109        gradPhiY = ( 2.0D0*( in03 - in04 ) + in07 - in08 + in10 - in09 + in15 &
00110                 - in16 + in17 - in18 )*inv12
00111 
00112        gradPhiZ = ( 2.0D0*( in05 - in06 ) + in11 - in12 + in14 - in13 + in15 &
00113                 - in16 + in18 - in17 )*inv12
00114 
00115 !-------- Hydrodynamics (velocity, pressure, interfacial force) ----------------
00116 ! Chemical potential
00117        muphin = alpha4*phin*( phin2 - phiStar2 ) - kappa*lapPhi
00118 
00119 ! Interfacial force and gravity
00120        sFx = muPhin*gradPhiX
00121        sFy = muPhin*gradPhiY
00122        sFz = muPhin*gradPhiZ
00123        IF (phin > 0.D0) sFz = sFz + grav
00124 
00125 ! Velocity
00126        ux = ( g(i,j,k, 1,now) - g(i,j,k, 2,now) + g(i,j,k, 7,now) &
00127           -   g(i,j,k, 8,now) + g(i,j,k, 9,now) - g(i,j,k,10,now) &
00128           +   g(i,j,k,11,now) - g(i,j,k,12,now) + g(i,j,k,13,now) &
00129           -   g(i,j,k,14,now) + 0.5D0*sFx )*invRhon
00130 
00131        uy = ( g(i,j,k, 3,now) - g(i,j,k, 4,now) + g(i,j,k, 7,now) &
00132           -   g(i,j,k, 8,now) - g(i,j,k, 9,now) + g(i,j,k,10,now) &
00133           +   g(i,j,k,15,now) - g(i,j,k,16,now) + g(i,j,k,17,now) &
00134           - g(i,j,k,18,now) + 0.5D0*sFy )*invRhon
00135 
00136        uz = ( g(i,j,k, 5,now) - g(i,j,k, 6,now) + g(i,j,k,11,now) &
00137           -   g(i,j,k,12,now) - g(i,j,k,13,now) + g(i,j,k,14,now) &
00138           +   g(i,j,k,15,now) - g(i,j,k,16,now) - g(i,j,k,17,now) &
00139           + g(i,j,k,18,now) + 0.5D0*sFz )*invRhon
00140 
00141 !-------- Collision for order parameter distribution function f ----------------
00142        Af0 = -3.D0*Gamma*muPhin*invTauPhi
00143        Af1 = 0.5D0*Gamma*muPhin*invTauPhi
00144        Cf1 = invTauPhi*invEta2*phin
00145 
00146        f(i,j,k,0,nxt) = invTauPhi1*f(i,j,k,0,now) + Af0 + invTauPhi*phin
00147        f(i,j,k,1,now) = invTauPhi1*f(i,j,k,1,now) + Af1 + Cf1*ux
00148        f(i,j,k,2,now) = invTauPhi1*f(i,j,k,2,now) + Af1 - Cf1*ux
00149        f(i,j,k,3,now) = invTauPhi1*f(i,j,k,3,now) + Af1 + Cf1*uy
00150        f(i,j,k,4,now) = invTauPhi1*f(i,j,k,4,now) + Af1 - Cf1*uy
00151        f(i,j,k,5,now) = invTauPhi1*f(i,j,k,5,now) + Af1 + Cf1*uz
00152        f(i,j,k,6,now) = invTauPhi1*f(i,j,k,6,now) + Af1 - Cf1*uz
00153 
00154 !-------- Collision for momentum distribution function g -----------------------
00155 ! The factor invTauRho for geq is embedded in Egn
00156        Ag0  = rhon - 6.D0*phin*muPhin
00157        Ag1  = 3.D0*phin*muPhin + rhon
00158        Eg1A = Eg1n*Ag1
00159        Eg2A = Eg2n*Ag1
00160        Eg1R = Eg1n*rhon
00161        Eg2R = Eg2n*rhon
00162        Vsq  = 1.5D0*( ux*ux + uy*uy + uz*uz )
00163        UF   = ux*sFx + uy*sFy + uz*sFz
00164 
00165 ! Rescale velocity to avoid unnecessary product operations
00166        ux = ux*invCs_sq
00167        uy = uy*invCs_sq
00168        uz = uz*invCs_sq
00169 
00170 ! The equilibrium g value and the force are bundled into gFs
00171 ! DIRECTION 0
00172        g(i,j,k,0,nxt) = invTauRhoOne*g(i,j,k,0,now) + Eg0n*( Ag0 - rhon*Vsq ) &
00173                       - EgC0n*UF
00174 
00175 ! DIRECTIONS 1 & 2
00176        geq1 = Eg1A + Eg1R*( 0.5D0*ux*ux - Vsq )
00177        geq2 = Eg1R*ux
00178 
00179        g(ie,j,k,1,nxt) = invTauRhoOne*g(i,j,k,1,now) + geq1 + geq2 &
00180                        + EgC1n*( ( 1.D0 + ux )*sFx - UF )
00181 
00182        g(iw,j,k,2,nxt) = invTauRhoOne*g(i,j,k,2,now) + geq1 - geq2 &
00183                        + EgC1n*( (-1.D0 + ux )*sFx - UF )
00184 
00185 ! DIRECTIONS 3 & 4
00186        geq1 = Eg1A + Eg1R*( 0.5D0*uy*uy - Vsq )
00187        geq2 = Eg1R*uy
00188 
00189        g(i,jn,k,3,nxt) = invTauRhoOne*g(i,j,k,3,now) + geq1 + geq2 &
00190                        + EgC1n*( ( 1.D0 + uy )*sFy - UF )
00191 
00192        g(i,js,k,4,nxt) = invTauRhoOne*g(i,j,k,4,now) + geq1 - geq2 &
00193                        + EgC1n*( (-1.D0 + uy )*sFy - UF )
00194 
00195 ! DIRECTIONS 5 & 6
00196        geq1 = Eg1A + Eg1R*( 0.5D0*uz*uz - Vsq )
00197        geq2 = Eg1R*uz
00198 
00199        g(i,j,kt,5,nxt) = invTauRhoOne*g(i,j,k,5,now) + geq1 + geq2 &
00200                        + EgC1n*( ( 1.D0 + uz )*sFz - UF )
00201 
00202        g(i,j,kb,6,nxt) = invTauRhoOne*g(i,j,k,6,now) + geq1 - geq2 &
00203                        + EgC1n*( (-1.D0 + uz )*sFz - UF )
00204 
00205 ! DIRECTION 7 & 8
00206        Vg   = ux + uy
00207        geq1 = Eg2A + Eg2R*( 0.5D0*Vg*Vg - Vsq )
00208        geq2 = Eg2R*Vg
00209 
00210        g(ie,jn,k,7,nxt) = invTauRhoOne*g(i,j,k,7,now) + geq1 + geq2 &
00211                         + EgC2n*( ( 1.D0 + Vg )*( sFx + sFy ) - UF )
00212 
00213        g(iw,js,k,8,nxt) = invTauRhoOne*g(i,j,k,8,now) + geq1 - geq2 &
00214                         + EgC2n*( (-1.D0 + Vg )*( sFx + sFy ) - UF )
00215 
00216 ! DIRECTIONS 9 & 10
00217        Vg   = ux - uy
00218        geq1 = Eg2A + Eg2R*( 0.5D0*Vg*Vg - Vsq )
00219        geq2 = Eg2R*Vg
00220 
00221        g(ie,js,k,9,nxt)  = invTauRhoOne*g(i,j,k,9,now) + geq1 + geq2  &
00222                          + EgC2n*( ( 1.D0 + Vg )*( sFx - sFy ) - UF )
00223 
00224        g(iw,jn,k,10,nxt) = invTauRhoOne*g(i,j,k,10,now) + geq1 - geq2 &
00225                          + EgC2n*( (-1.D0 + Vg )*( sFx - sFy ) - UF )
00226 
00227 ! DIRECTIONS 11 & 12
00228        Vg   = ux + uz
00229        geq1 = Eg2A + Eg2R*( 0.5D0*Vg*Vg - Vsq )
00230        geq2 = Eg2R*Vg
00231 
00232        g(ie,j,kt,11,nxt) = invTauRhoOne*g(i,j,k,11,now) + geq1 + geq2 &
00233                          + EgC2n*( ( 1.D0 + Vg )*( sFx + sFz ) - UF )
00234 
00235        g(iw,j,kb,12,nxt) = invTauRhoOne*g(i,j,k,12,now) + geq1 - geq2 &
00236                          + EgC2n*( (-1.D0 + Vg )*( sFx + sFz ) - UF )
00237 
00238 ! DIRECTIONS 13 & 14
00239        Vg   = ux - uz
00240        geq1 = Eg2A + Eg2R*( 0.5D0*Vg*Vg - Vsq )
00241        geq2 = Eg2R*Vg
00242 
00243        g(ie,j,kb,13,nxt) = invTauRhoOne*g(i,j,k,13,now) + geq1 + geq2 &
00244                          + EgC2n*( ( 1.D0 + Vg )*( sFx - sFz ) - UF )
00245 
00246        g(iw,j,kt,14,nxt) = invTauRhoOne*g(i,j,k,14,now) + geq1 - geq2 &
00247                          + EgC2n*( (-1.D0 + Vg )*( sFx - sFz ) - UF )
00248 ! DIRECTIONS 15 & 16
00249        Vg   = uy + uz
00250        geq1 = Eg2A + Eg2R*( 0.5D0*Vg*Vg - Vsq )
00251        geq2 = Eg2R*Vg
00252 
00253        g(i,jn,kt,15,nxt) = invTauRhoOne*g(i,j,k,15,now) + geq1 + geq2 &
00254                          + EgC2n*( ( 1.D0 + Vg )*( sFy + sFz ) - UF )
00255 
00256        g(i,js,kb,16,nxt) = invTauRhoOne*g(i,j,k,16,now) + geq1 - geq2 &
00257                          + EgC2n*( (-1.D0 + Vg )*( sFy + sFz ) - UF )
00258 
00259 ! DIRECTIONS 17 & 18
00260        Vg   = uy - uz
00261        geq1 = Eg2A + Eg2R*( 0.5D0*Vg*Vg - Vsq )
00262        geq2 = Eg2R*Vg
00263 
00264        g(i,jn,kb,17,nxt) = invTauRhoOne*g(i,j,k,17,now) + geq1 + geq2 &
00265                          + EgC2n*( ( 1.D0 + Vg )*( sFy - sFz ) - UF )
00266 
00267        g(i,js,kt,18,nxt) = invTauRhoOne*g(i,j,k,18,now) + geq1 - geq2 &
00268                          + EgC2n*( (-1.D0 + Vg )*( sFy - sFz ) - UF )
00269 
00270      END DO
00271    END DO
00272  END DO
00273 
00274  RETURN
00275  END SUBROUTINE Collision
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:46 2008 for ZSC-3D-STD-MPI by  1.5.6
